bork

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • bork.GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores, recalls, and creates all the resources for the current state of the game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GameState.IllegalSaveFormatException
      Exception for illegal file formats that pushes the error up the stack

      • instance

        static GameState instance()
        Creates a new gamestate and returns it or returns the gamestate if one already exists
        Returns:

      • restore

        void restore(java.lang.String filename)
      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
             GameState.IllegalSaveFormatException,
             Dungeon.IllegalDungeonFormatException
        Restores the GameState conditions from file
        Parameters:
        filename - the file the GameState is read in from
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Signals the the attempt to open a file has failed
        GameState.IllegalSaveFormatException - Signals that the save file read from is incorrectly formated
        Dungeon.IllegalDungeonFormatException - Signals that the dungeon file read from is incorrectly formated

    throws java.io.IOException
        Stores the current state of the game with default save file name

        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occured

      • getItemInVicinityNamed

        Item getItemInVicinityNamed(java.lang.String name)
                     throws Item.NoItemException
        Returns the item with the name from input if it is found in the current room or the player's inventory
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the item to be returned
        Returns:
        Item the item that is found with a name matching the searched item
        Throws:
        Item.NoItemException - Signals that the item was not found in inventory nor the current room
